headline: Apollo Explores Sale of Internet Pioneer AOL
summary: Apollo acquired AOL in 2021 as part of a deal to acquire that business and Yahoo from Verizon. A new deal could fetch around $1.5 billion.

raw.headline: Apollo Explores Sale of Internet Pioneer AOL

headline: Investment-Grade Private Credit Needs Bank Partnerships: Apollo
summary: "The future of IG private credit is really in partnership with the banks no doubt about it," Apollo Global Management President Jim Zelter said in an interview with Bloomberg. Apollo has 12 origination partnerships with banks, according to Zelter, in addition to its own deal-sourcing teams. Those include tie-ups with BNP Paribas, Citigroup, Standard Chartered, and others that are "private, or have not been announced, but still very active," he explained in an interview with Francine Lacqua.
